Talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Angry_01>I told you, whatever you're after, I'm too
busy to—<sp:5:1:0> Huh?
Talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_01>Yeah! This could work!<sp:0:4:0>Sorry to run, but I want to put Great-
Grandpa's advice into practice right away.<sp:0:4:0>If you need me, I'll be back at the house!
Talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00>I need to get my hands on that <clr:0000>message
bottle <clr:ffff>floating in the pond, quick.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think_00>I finally found the letter my great-grandpa
left, but...<sp:5:0:0>the cows got a bit rambunctious
and I accidentally dropped it in the pond.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01><sp:0:2:2:5000>That letter has the advice I need to get this farm
back on its feet... <sp:5:0:0>If I don't get my hands on it,
we're sunk.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>Huh?
Talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Greeting_00>It's right over there, by the way. Come by
a bit later so I can thank you for the help.
Talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>If I play my cards right, I can start making
a new signature product. It'll be good not
just for our farm, but for the whole village!<sp:0:4:0><snd:LaughS_00>I'm itching to get started!
Talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>How do I fix this?<sp:5:0:0> Do I dive into the pond? <sp:5:0:0>There's
no way... Not with all this rain... <sp:5:1:0>Huh?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_10:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01>Oh. It's you again. Listen, whatever you're
here for, I can't help you.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>I need to get my hands on that <clr:0000>message
bottle <clr:ffff>floating in the pond, quick.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Ease_00>I finally found the letter my great-grandpa
left, but it accidentally fell in the pond.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>That letter has the advice I need to get this farm
back on its feet... <sp:5:0:0>If I don't get my hands on it,
we're sunk.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0b01><snd:SurpriseL_00>That's my great-grandpa's message
bottle! <sp:5:1:0>But how did you...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_11:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>How do I fix this?<sp:5:0:0> Do I dive into the pond?<sp:5:0:0> There's
no way... That's too deep to swim... <sp:5:1:0>Huh?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Happy_00>Did you fish it out for me? Thanks!<sp:0:4:0>There should be a letter in this bottle
with advice for getting our farm back on
its feet.<sp:0:4:0>Let's see here...
Talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Can't reach for it—my arms are too short. Pond's too
deep to swim, and anyways I don't know how.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>But that letter has the advice I need to get this
farm back on its feet... If I don't get my hands
on it, we're sunk.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Hmm... Yep, there we go. Gosh, do I miss
Great-Grandpa's handwriting.<sp:0:4:0>His penmanship was so messy that no one
but him and his family could read it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Oho... I hadn't thought of that...<sp:5:1:0>
Talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_00><sp:0:2:2:5000>How do I fix this?<sp:5:0:0> Do I dive into the pond?<sp:5:0:0> But it's
so dark...and anyways, I can't swim. <sp:5:1:0>Huh?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0301>What's with that blank stare? <sp:5:1:0>Oh...<sp:5:0:0>
You must be a customer.
Talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:QuestionNormal_01>Maybe here is good? <sp:5:1:0>No... <sp:5:0:0>I like it better
this way.
Talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Sorry, but if you're here on farm business,
you'll have to talk to my dad at the farm.
Talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:Notice_00>Ah! Good, you showed up. Take a look
at this!
Talk_28:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_00>Ta-da! <sp:5:0:0>The <clr:0000>Hateno Cheese Shop<clr:ffff> is
complete! What do you think?!<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0>The next step is to get those folks over
at the general store to start stocking it.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>That reminds me. <sp:5:0:0>You won't get this offer
anywhere else, but around here, I'll give
you some for fresh milk instead of rupees.<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><snd:TalkPositive_01>I'll make the dream my great-grandpa
gave up on come true, <sp:5:1:0>and this farm will
be busier than ever in the bargain.<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01><snd:LaughS_00>So...<sp:5:1:0>you'll come visit me again, right?<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0001>Sorry, but if you're here on farm business,
it's my dad you want. He's in the house.
Talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Think_01>But back to the reason I called you here.
It's... Well, you know...<sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:3:0:2:0c01>I couldn't have made this without you, so I...<sp:5:0:0>
I wanted you to be the first to have some...<sp:5:1:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:3:0:2:0901><snd:Work_00>A-anyway, consider this my thanks.
Go on—take it already.<sp:0:2:2:5000><sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're here on farm business, you'll
have to talk to my dad at the farm.
Talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:Greeting_01>As I understand it, <sp:5:0:0>Great-Grandpa worked
with the mayor back then on this <clr:0000>Hateno
cheese<clr:ffff> to put our village on the map.<sp:0:4:0>But it was ahead of its time. <sp:5:0:0>The villagers
rejected it.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0801>Having eaten this, <sp:5:0:0>I think they were nuts.<sp:5:0:0>
Now is the time for Hateno cheese to
make a splash in the culinary world!<sp:0:4:0>I'm sick of fashion getting all the attention
lately. <sp:5:0:0>It's really eating into our business.<sp:0:4:0><snd:Happy_01>But if anything will bring the customers
in, it's this! <sp:5:0:0>I'd say it's time to do some
renovation around here!
Talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Think>I finally found the letter my great-grandpa
left, but then I went and dropped the
<clr:0000>bottle<clr:ffff> in the pond.<sp:5:0:0>
<sp:3:0:2:0a01><sp:0:2:2:5000>Can't reach for it—my arms are too short. Pond's too
deep to swim, and anyways I don't know how.<sp:0:2:2:6400>
Talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:LaughL_01>I call it <clr:0000>Hateno cheese<clr:ffff>. That message my
great-grandpa left behind had the recipe.<sp:0:4:0>It's springy on the outside but melty on
the inside and so delicious, you'll think
you're dreaming!
Talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>I need to get my hands on that <clr:0000>message
bottle <clr:ffff>floating in the pond, quick.<sp:5:0:0><sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0a01><snd:Sad_01>I finally found the letter my great-grandpa
left, but...
Talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>If you're here on farm business, it's my
dad you want. He's in the house.
